doc.title: 48 Hours Later
doc.plot: On day one, in a laboratory, someone releases a Mickey-Mouse like creature with beastly teeth; the creature begins to kill. On day two, a young woman awakens in a hospital bed, removes an IV, and walks out into a deserted world. She walks the streets calling out. Somewhere in the city, a man also looks for others. On day three, zombies discover her and give chase. Will the man come to her rescue? Do they have a future?
